shortdesc.i: Event listener when a user's information is updated. Assign a function to receive user updates.

section.p: User updates can be captured such as profile information and application installation changes. Updates can be received from the current user, contacts who have the application, and non-contacts who have joined in an application connection with the current user.

dd.p: The user whose information was updated.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

    document.addEventListener("onupdate", function(user, event) {
        // Handle events for other user
        if (event == "personalmessage") {
            alert("Personal message update: " + user.personalmessage);
        }
    };

</script>
